definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
lit. splitting the head and covering the face (idiom); fig. pelting (with rain etc)/showering down

sentences.english: Too much bone in their skulls.
sentences.chinese: 马的头盖上，骨头太多了。

sentences.english: The newest version of the outrageously fun, smash-hit board game, Cranium?
sentences.chinese: 粗暴乐趣的新版本，捣毁击中了棋，头盖骨？

sentences.english: Remove the cartridge, the case cover and the small cover.
sentences.chinese: 卸下墨盒和左侧机箱头盖及后小盖板。

sentences.english: The skull should be fairly long, slightly domed at occiput, with cranium broad and full.
sentences.chinese: 头部相对较长，后枕骨略微圆拱，头盖骨宽而丰满。

sentences.english: I saw Monk Tang San Zang's head bone.
sentences.chinese: 我看到了唐三藏的头盖骨。
倾盆大雨劈头盖脸地浇了下来。

sentences.english: Part of his head cover is a sunny yellow.
sentences.chinese: 他的头盖部分是一个阳光灿烂的黄色。

sentences.english: It's like a skullcap and looks so awkward.
sentences.chinese: 这就像一个头盖骨，看起来很尴尬。

sentences.english: Many congenital hydrocephalics have a dome-shaped, prominent calvarium .
sentences.chinese: 很多原发性水脑症的病例有圆且突出的头盖骨。

sentences.english: Bosom husband bridal chamber, hundred flatters thousand jiao red cranium.
sentences.chinese: 知心郎君洞房外，百媚千娇红头盖。

sentences.english: A cranial trauma with a wound in the parietal region.
sentences.chinese: 在吉拉头盖骨的颅顶骨的区域有个伤口。

sentences.english: Questions showered on him by the reporters.
sentences.chinese: 记者们的问题劈头盖脸地问了一大堆。

sentences.english: Use human skull as a pot to grow a traditional mini-bonsai.
sentences.chinese: 用头盖骨做盆莳植保守微型盆景。

sentences.english: She has just given him a good scolding right to his face.
sentences.chinese: 她刚才劈头盖脸地给了他一通臭骂。

sentences.english: Continue by bringing the wide end back over in front of the narrow end again.
sentences.chinese: 继续用宽的一头盖过窄的一头交叉。

definition: to push aside (clothing, curtain etc) to reveal something/to toss aside
half of sth/one side of sth
